product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Cliffside Sleeping Bag - Regular - Special Buy
long_description: The ALPS Mountaineering Cliffside Sleeping Bag uses 700-fill-power goose down insulation for excellent warmth and compression on backpacking trips throughout spring, summer and fall. Down insulation delivers an unsurpassed warmth-to-weight ratio; it's one of the lightest, warmest and most compressible insulations available. The ALPS Mountaineering Cliffside Sleeping Bag is rated to keep you warm down to about 20degF for 3-season backpacking use. Full-length zipper. Compression stuff sack and storage sack included. Special buy.
